sentences.sContent: You are asked to swallow a capsule containing vitamin B.
sentences.sCn: 你被要求吞下一颗含维生素B的胶囊。

sentences.sContent: Polly took a bite of the apple, chewed, and swallowed.
sentences.sCn: 波莉咬了一口那个苹果，嚼了嚼吞了下去。

trans.tranOther: If you swallow something, you cause it to go from your mouth down into your stomach
a small black and white bird that comes to northern countries in the summer
